title: Why cant I view my owned skins ????
body: Man I don't understand why I cant just see my freaking owned skins.. people have been asking for this for like 5 seasons.. Begging.. You do many things people don't ask for like change the announcer voice.. But you never show me my owned skins without me having to sift through one million skins I don't own. how about something that shows the once I already OWN PLEASE BY THEMSELVES.. PLEASEEEEEE

replies.body:
I believe Riot has reported that they plan to make a new tab/feature to their client where you can view all skins owned on your profile which acts much like the champions tab where you can view all and owned champions.

I cannot find the link to where they posted this but if I find it i'll notify you.

NOTE: I may not be 100% correct on this
Yeah, they're adding this in preseason.
